lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Herrington said he understood the Reagan's reluctance to amend the newly enacted tax code to fund some of these proposals, but added he hoped his department's energy/security study would make a strong case for the need to help the struggling domestic oil industry.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Another move Herrington said he will press anew, even though it had been rejected earlier by the White House, is to raise the fill-rate for the Strategic Petroleum Reserve to 100,000 barrels a day from its planned 1988 rate of 35,000.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: S. oil production, but he said all would cost the Treasury money and will come under close White House scrutiny before action is taken.
